  • Changelog

    Invert a Jacobian matrix with numerically robust fallbacks.

    invert_jacobian.Rd

    Attempts a plain inverse when the matrix is well conditioned, otherwise applies ridge regularisation or a pseudo-inverse as requested.

    invert_jacobian(
  A_matrix,
  variance_ridge = FALSE,
  variance_pseudoinverse = FALSE,
  kappa_threshold = 1e+08,
  ridge_scale = NULL,
  svd_tol = NULL
)

    Arguments

    A_matrix

    Numeric square matrix to invert.

    variance_ridge

    Logical or positive numeric: apply ridge stabilisation (`TRUE` selects an adaptive ridge, numeric values supply the ridge size).

    variance_pseudoinverse

    Logical; if `TRUE`, compute an SVD-based pseudo-inverse.

    kappa_threshold

    Numeric tolerance controlling when the plain inverse is attempted.

    ridge_scale

    Optional numeric multiplier for the adaptive ridge.

    svd_tol

    Optional numeric tolerance below which singular values are truncated when forming the pseudo-inverse.

    Contents

    Developed by Maciej Beręsewicz.
